greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers of divisors of semiprime powers: A000005(A085155(n)).
comment: The range of this sequence is the union of squares and the odd numbers: A128201.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: sppQ[n_] := With[{f = FactorInteger[n][[All, 2]]}, n == 1 || Length[f] == 1 && EvenQ[f[[1]]] || Length[f] == 2 && f[[1]] == f[[2]]];
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 04 2007
